subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Coming off its best season in nearly 20 years, Arkansas is embroiled in a controversy involving the heralded quarterback Mitch Mustain that has bitterly divided Razorbacks fans.
snippet: Coming off its best season in nearly 20 years, Arkansas is embroiled in a controversy involving the heralded quarterback Mitch Mustain that has bitterly divided Razorbacks fans.
